page.title: 19RELIGION
page.content: {QUAKERS}- Frenchay Lodge and Riverwood House formerly known as Frenchay Grove were both associated with leading members of the Society Of Friends (Quakers), William Penn and Joseph Fry.They re-named Frenchay Grove the Friends Meeting House.The original Friends Meeting House was built in 1673 and was replaced by the present building in 1809. { {CHURCHES}- The Parish Church for the Dowend area is{ChristChurch. {St.Augstines Roman Catholic Church}is on Boscombe Cres. and Badminton Rd. {Methodist Church}with it's community hall is,as the name indicates is on Badminton Rd. There are three places of worship in the Hambrook area.The{Whiteshill {United Reformed Chapel, All Saints {C.of.E Church}and{Bethesda Chapel.
